42 using string_pair = std::tuple<string, string>;

45 
49 class property
50 {
52  MQTTProperty prop_;
53 
54  // Make a deep copy of the property struct into this one.
55  // For string properties, this allocates memory and copied the string(s)
56  void copy(const MQTTProperty& other);
57 
58 public:
62  enum code {
63  PAYLOAD_FORMAT_INDICATOR = 1,
64  MESSAGE_EXPIRY_INTERVAL = 2,
65  CONTENT_TYPE = 3,
66  RESPONSE_TOPIC = 8,
67  CORRELATION_DATA = 9,
68  SUBSCRIPTION_IDENTIFIER = 11,
69  SESSION_EXPIRY_INTERVAL = 17,
70  ASSIGNED_CLIENT_IDENTIFER = 18,
71  SERVER_KEEP_ALIVE = 19,
72  AUTHENTICATION_METHOD = 21,
73  AUTHENTICATION_DATA = 22,
74  REQUEST_PROBLEM_INFORMATION = 23,
75  WILL_DELAY_INTERVAL = 24,
76  REQUEST_RESPONSE_INFORMATION = 25,
77  RESPONSE_INFORMATION = 26,
78  SERVER_REFERENCE = 28,
79  REASON_STRING = 31,
80  RECEIVE_MAXIMUM = 33,
81  TOPIC_ALIAS_MAXIMUM = 34,
82  TOPIC_ALIAS = 35,
83  MAXIMUM_QOS = 36,
84  RETAIN_AVAILABLE = 37,
85  USER_PROPERTY = 38,
86  MAXIMUM_PACKET_SIZE = 39,
87  WILDCARD_SUBSCRIPTION_AVAILABLE = 40,
88  SUBSCRIPTION_IDENTIFIERS_AVAILABLE = 41,
89  SHARED_SUBSCRIPTION_AVAILABLE = 42
90  };
91 
98  property(code c, int32_t val);
104  property(code c, string_ref val);
111  property(code c, string_ref name, string_ref val);
116  explicit property(const MQTTProperty& cprop);
122  explicit property(MQTTProperty&& cprop);
127  property(const property& other);
132  property(property&& other);
136  ~property();
142  property& operator=(const property& rhs);
148  property& operator=(property&& rhs);
154  const MQTTProperty& c_struct() const { return prop_; }
159  code type() const { return code(prop_.identifier); }
164  const char* type_name() const {
165  return ::MQTTPropertyName(prop_.identifier);
166  }
167 };
168 
173 template <typename T>
174 inline T get(const property&) { throw bad_cast(); }
175 
180 template <>
181 inline uint8_t get<uint8_t>(const property& prop) {
182  return (uint8_t) prop.c_struct().value.byte;
183 }
184 
189 template <>
190 inline uint16_t get<uint16_t>(const property& prop) {
191  return (uint16_t) prop.c_struct().value.integer2;
192 }
193 
198 template <>
199 inline int16_t get<int16_t>(const property& prop) {
200  return (int16_t) prop.c_struct().value.integer2;
201 }
202 
207 template <>
208 inline uint32_t get<uint32_t>(const property& prop) {
209  return (uint32_t) prop.c_struct().value.integer4;
210 }
211 
216 template <>
217 inline int32_t get<int32_t>(const property& prop) {
218  return (int32_t) prop.c_struct().value.integer4;
219 }
220 
225 template <>
226 inline string get<string>(const property& prop) {
227  return (!prop.c_struct().value.data.data) ? string()
228  : string(prop.c_struct().value.data.data, prop.c_struct().value.data.len);
229 }
230 
235 template <>
236 inline string_pair get<string_pair>(const property& prop) {
237  string name = (!prop.c_struct().value.data.data) ? string()
238  : string(prop.c_struct().value.data.data, prop.c_struct().value.data.len);
239 
240  string value = (!prop.c_struct().value.value.data) ? string()
241  : string(prop.c_struct().value.value.data, prop.c_struct().value.value.len);
242 
243  return std::make_tuple(std::move(name), std::move(value));
244 }
245 
247 
254 class properties
255 {
257  MQTTProperties props_;
258 
259  template<typename T>
260  friend T get(const properties& props, property::code propid, size_t idx);
261 
262  template<typename T>
263  friend T get(const properties& props, property::code propid);
264 
265 public:
270  properties() {
271  std::memset(&props_, 0, sizeof(MQTTProperties));
272  }
277  properties(const properties& other)
278  : props_(::MQTTProperties_copy(&other.props_)) {}
283  properties(properties&& other) : props_(other.props_) {
284  std::memset(&other.props_, 0, sizeof(MQTTProperties));
285  }
290  properties(const MQTTProperties& cprops) {
291  props_ = ::MQTTProperties_copy(&cprops);
292  }
297  properties(std::initializer_list<property> props);
301  ~properties() { ::MQTTProperties_free(&props_); }
306  const MQTTProperties& c_struct() const { return props_; }
312  properties& operator=(const properties& rhs) {
313  if (&rhs != this) {
314  ::MQTTProperties_free(&props_);
315  props_ = ::MQTTProperties_copy(&rhs.props_);
316  }
317  return *this;
318  }
324  properties& operator=(properties&& rhs) {
325  if (&rhs != this) {
326  ::MQTTProperties_free(&props_);
327  props_ = rhs.props_;
328  std::memset(&rhs.props_, 0, sizeof(MQTTProperties));
329  }
330  return *this;
331  }
337  bool empty() const { return props_.count == 0; }
342  size_t size() const { return size_t(props_.count); }
349  #if 0
350  // Note: This isn't exported by the shared library. Perhaps we can change
351  // that in the upstream C lib.
352  size_t byte_length() const {
353  return (size_t) ::MQTTProperties_len(const_cast<MQTTProperties*>(&props_));
354  }
355  #endif
360  void add(const property& prop) {
361  ::MQTTProperties_add(&props_, &prop.c_struct());
362  }
366  void clear();
372  bool contains(property::code propid) const {
373  return ::MQTTProperties_hasProperty(const_cast<MQTTProperties*>(&props_),
374  MQTTPropertyCodes(propid)) != 0;
375  }
386  size_t count(property::code propid) const {
387  return size_t(::MQTTProperties_propertyCount(
388  const_cast<MQTTProperties*>(&props_), MQTTPropertyCodes(propid)));
389  }
398  property get(property::code propid, size_t idx=0);
399 };
400 
401 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
402 
412 template<typename T>
413 inline T get(const properties& props, property::code propid, size_t idx)
414 {
415  MQTTProperty* prop = MQTTProperties_getPropertyAt(
416  const_cast<MQTTProperties*>(&props.c_struct()),
417  MQTTPropertyCodes(propid), int(idx));
418  if (!prop)
419  throw bad_cast();
420 
421  return get<T>(property(*prop));
422 }
423 
431 template<typename T>
432 inline T get(const properties& props, property::code propid)
433 {
434  return get<T>(props, propid, 0);
435 }
436 
438 // end namespace mqtt
439 }
440 
441 #endif // __mqtt_properties_h
